Adjustable Scissors: Implement adjustable thumb and finger holes to accommodate users of different sizes and hand shapes, ensuring a secure grip and ease of use.
LED Lighting: Add LED lights to the scissors that illuminate the cutting path, making it easier to see and cut precise lines in various lighting conditions.
Magnetic Blade Lock: Develop a magnetic blade lock that keeps the blades together when not in use, preventing accidental cuts and increasing safety.
Multi-Tool Scissors: Incorporate a multi-tool feature, such as a small screwdriver, nail file, or tweezers, into the scissors for added convenience.
Smart Scissors: Integrate smart technology into the scissors that tracks usage and maintenance, providing users with personalized cutting tips and blade replacements.
